_meanings:
{@--2@} Whirling or going round,
rolling about.

{@--4@} Hurry, confusion, 
flurry, perturbation; especially, the
flurry of mind caused by love;  
{#cittavfttyanavasTAnaM SfMgArAdbiBramo Bavet#}.

{@--6@} Any amorous or 
sportive action, amorous play or 
movement; <ls>Māl. 1. 26</ls>, <ls n="Māl.">9. 38.</ls>
